com.percussion.services.legacy
Interface IPSCmsContentSummaries

public interface IPSCmsContentSummaries

This interface is provided as the public (Rx implementers) interface to this service. This interface provides methods for loading legacy item summaries.

Author:
paulhoward

Method Summary
 List<PSComponentSummary> loadComponentSummaries(Collection<Integer> ids)
          Load one or more component summaries by content id.
 PSComponentSummary loadComponentSummary(int id)
          Load a single component summary by content id.
 

Method Detail

loadComponentSummaries

List<PSComponentSummary> loadComponentSummaries(Collection<Integer> ids)
Load one or more component summaries by content id.

Parameters:
ids - One or more content ids, never null or empty.
Returns:
One or more component summaries, which may or may not be in the same order as the ids. The size of the returned list may not match the size of the content ids.

loadComponentSummary

PSComponentSummary loadComponentSummary(int id)
Load a single component summary by content id.

Parameters:
id - a content id
Returns:
A valid summary or null if the summary is not found.
